message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13500. I think this is a great price considering the value it brings to the table.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $12000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $14000. It's a fair price considering the value it brings, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to own something truly unique.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the gesture, I still feel that we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $13000 for the product.

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13500. It's a fair price considering the value it brings, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to own something truly unique.
